ygData.subject: Magical weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I was just wondering if anyone knew of a place I might find a magical weapon of some sort. Nothing really powerfull, I m only 10th lvl right now, I just need
ygData.messageBody:
I was just wondering if anyone knew of a place I might find a magical
weapon of some sort. Nothing really powerfull, I'm only 10th lvl right
now, I just need something that will do damage to iceboned skeletons and
ghouls. Also, I seem to be making money very slowly. The only trade skills
I have are cooking and a little blacksmithing. Is there a good zone to
make money in? The most money I have ever had at one time is 8 pp! Is this
normal or am I going about things all wrong?


Thank you for your assistance my friends,
Sir Reppik, Paladin of the 10th order
Freeport, Bertoxxulous
